channel.title: [Delta] Double Xp Ring

item.title: [Delta] Double Xp Ring
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I added this to make a double xp ring give you double xp as you skill and it didn’t work, I don’t know why, I tried looking up topics where people had the same problem but nothing worked.

if (wearID == 1635) { //X2 ring doublexp = true; }

and this as the doublexp void:

if (doublexp == true){ playerXP[skill] += amount*2; } else { playerXP[skill] += amount; }

Read full topic
